title: Love And Robots
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we don't have a hot button issue. We take off the restraints and share whatever wants to come through. 

Wellness Segment: Fran's SPF + tanning tips
